name: Super Sketch
overview: An educational sketching game released with the Super Sketch Video Graphics Tablet for the Commodore 64 and a few other platforms. It could also be used as a type of lightbox for outlining drawings you wanted on your commodore. Super Sketch gives you the ability to create super video graphics without years of programming experience. In fact, you will be able to produce beautiful graphics immediately. Super Sketch is a fun device for either child or adult. In addition, it provides the easiest possible introduction into the use of a computer. Its menu-driven command system provides an intuitive method of operation that is easy to learn for the first-time computer user. Super Sketch provides the lowest cost introduction to the world of computer graphics. It is an excellent new medium for the artist and a design vehicle for many graphics applications as well as providing fun and entertainment for the whole family.
